title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-3.5 - Renewal of certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-3.5 - Renewal of certification

State Regulations
A candidate whose certification has expired may renew
certification by making a written application to the New York State Department
of Taxation and Finance, Office of Real Property Tax

Services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8188-3.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
